description: Kou is the future owner of the Ichinomiya corporation. He is 22-years old and an university student. Throughout his life he had been living with the family rule of never being indebted to anyone. Because of an accident, he started a love relationship with his saviour, http://anidb.net/ch15159 [Nino]. He was named "Recruit" (リクルート) by the village chief but the villagers usually call him "Rec" for short. If he becomes indebted to someone but cannot repay them back he`ll start having an asthma attack. Even since he was little he had received the best education, knows how to play multiple instruments, a black belt in karate and many other talents. His job in the village is be the teacher for the village`s children.
name: Ichinomiya Kou
